message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn to be reasonable, Alice. This is a fair split.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Let's stop wasting time, Alice. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.
I'll give you a bit more, but 50/50 is not acceptable to me.
Alice, we're running out of time! This offer is a compromise. Take it before inflation eats away at the value even further.
